## LinearRegressorHyperparams.lambda property

A number whose value influences the penalty for large coefficients. Large values of `lambda` correspond to highly regularized models, and correct for overfitting. Small values of `lambda` correspond to highly biased models, and correct for underfitting.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lambda: number;
```
